Name: Layers
About the game: Layers is a puzzle platformer that has a unique twist. You much complete a level by interacting with the environment and using the objects in both the White and Black Layer. Using your ability to switch objects from one layer to another to complete complex puzzles and get all the playable characters to the exit door. Watch out for traps! If one character dies its game over! You can also create you own levels and with workshop support you can share them with your friends and the community. Features Fully functioning level editor Steam Workshop support to share and play countless levels Carefully planned puzzles Unique game play and concept Steam Achievements
